stripped_text: Whenever you take 1 or more tags, if you had no tags, you may install 1 connection resource from your grip, paying 2 credits less. As an additional cost to trash a connection resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.
text: Whenever you take 1 or more tags, if you had no tags, you may install 1 connection resource from your grip, paying 2[credit] less. As an additional cost to trash a connection resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.
title: Sebastião Souza Pessoa: Activist Organizer
